column4: hi everybody... how do I change my MAC adress...??? Somebody told me I don't need special program but instead use ifconfig... but I haven't figured out yet... anybody knows????
I use a "pre-up" line in /etc/network/interfaces to do it each time the interface comes up
I reckon I have to disconnect... cause I get device busy error
yes.  use a "pre-up" line to do it before the interface comes up
do I write it at the beginning?
thanx pal... is this monchromatic or is it color only?
I've no idea, I jfgi'ed it
ok I'll find out... thanx a milion..
where do I put (extract) the GIMP plugin??
I don't know, but I would guess /usr/lib/gimp/2.0/plug-ins; or maybe ~/.gimp-2.2/plug-ins is better
does holding control and pressing the arrow keys switch desktops?
